title: Explore the Keurig® K-Cup® System
description: The Keurig K-Cup System is the simple way to enjoy your favorite gourmet coffee. Brew your perfect cup at the touch of a button in less than a minute.

asset.author: Keurig Inc
asset.hookText: The Keurig K-Cup System is the simple way to enjoy your favorite gourmet coffee. Brew your perfect cup at the touch of a button in less than a minute.

transcripts: The K-cup pack starts with a single portion of gourmet quality beans. Precisely ground in measure to exact roster specifications, contained in a mess free filter. The K-cup pack is an air-tight chamber that seals in flavor and freshness by locking out oxygen, light, and humidity. Drop the K-cup pack into any K-cup brewer and press brew. Pressurized water flows through the K-cup pack at the ideal temperature for optimal brewing. A sophisticated filter assures superior brewing results as the coffee is brewed inside the K-cup pack. The Keurig K-cup system, choose from over 200 varieties of your favorite coffee, tea, hot cocoa, ice and specialty beverages. Brewed just for you. Keurig choose, brew, enjoy.
